name: Space Scout
description:
Reach the planets

Click on the planets to move towards them, but be careful! Once clicked you’ll have to wait for the ship to reach the planet to move again!

 Avoid the comet

Avoid the comets and don’t leave the screen or the ship will explode!

Buy ships

Collect money to buy new ships! Each has a power-up!

Credits

Icon made by Vectors Market and Kiranshastry from www.flaticon.com

Assets by flawlessattila on gamedevmarket.net

Music by Roboxel on itch.io
